messages.messageBody:
LOL! Sano's mouth really got him in trouble this time...so he gets
sent to a special room XD

(note to readers of kikue-mugen.com now known as samurai-on-samurai.com
the writing really is hard yaoi--not the cuddly stuff with all the
parts censored in more mainstream manga, so it really is for mature
readers)
